LanguageData.HIDMelee_BaseballBat.label: бейсбольна бита
LanguageData.HIDMelee_BaseballBat.description: A long, two handed shaped stick made for baseball. While not intended for combat, it is still essentially a refined cudgel, perfect for bludgeoning.
LanguageData.HIDMelee_BaseballBat.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.HIDMelee_BaseballBat.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.HIDMelee_PoolCue.label: кий
LanguageData.HIDMelee_PoolCue.description: A long, two handed shaped stick made for billiards. Its light weight and long length make it a surprisingly effective staff, with a point at the end for quick pokes.
LanguageData.HIDMelee_PoolCue.tools.0.label: shaft
LanguageData.HIDMelee_PoolCue.tools.1.label: shaft
LanguageData.HIDMelee_PoolCue.tools.2.label: tip
LanguageData.HIDMelee_PoliceTonfa.label: коліцейська донфа
LanguageData.HIDMelee_PoliceTonfa.description: A simple yet effective tool for showing people who's the boss. Quick to attack but not very lethal.
LanguageData.HIDMelee_PoliceTonfa.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.HIDMelee_PoliceTonfa.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.HIDMelee_PoliceTonfa.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.HIDMelee_SurvivalHatchet.label: сокира для виживання
LanguageData.HIDMelee_SurvivalHatchet.description: Mainly intended for cutting up firewood, but functions just fine as a weapon.
LanguageData.HIDMelee_SurvivalHatchet.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.HIDMelee_SurvivalHatchet.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.HIDMelee_Crowbar.label: лом
LanguageData.HIDMelee_Crowbar.description: A solid steel bar with a hook made for prying. Heavy and unwieldy, but devastating if it hits.
LanguageData.HIDMelee_Crowbar.tools.0.label: shaft
LanguageData.HIDMelee_Crowbar.tools.1.label: beak
